data: The person Robert Smith is the Founder & CEO of Innovate Inc in the Healthcare Tech industry.
The person Robert Smith has eight years of professional experience.
The person Robert Smith started his career as a software engineer at MedSoft.
The person Robert Smith has expertise in product strategy, fundraising, and team leadership.
The person Robert Smith has raised $10M in seed funding and scaled a company to 50 employees.
The person Robert Smith is based in Boston, MA, United States.
The person Robert Smith is currently raising a Series A round for his second startup.
The person Robert Smith sources information from Crunchbase and Twitter for research.
